name: paper production, woodfree, uncoated, 50% recycled content, at non-integrated mill | paper, woodfree, uncoated | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11111/documentation

This dataset represents the Quebec production of uncoated woodfree paper with 50% recycled content in a non-integrated mill, including paper production and converting into sheets, energy production on-site (natural gas, heavy fuel oil and biobas combustion) and internal waste water treatment. The packaging in which the paper is sold is not included, but wrapping energy is included. 

From reception of sulfate and deinked pulp at the factory gate. 

The activity ends with packaged paper sheets ready for shipping.

The dataset includes pulp preparation, paper production and converting into sheets, packaging energy consumption, energy production on-site (natural gas, heavy fuel oil and biogas combustion), internal waste water treatment.

The dataset doesn't include deinking, packaging materials and commercial and human activities.

The data originate from a paper mill which produces different types of woodfree papers. The allocation of most materials between the different coproducts were made based on the recipe (pulp, mineral charges and chemicals) specific for each grade of paper. However, it was inevitable to make allocation for some general inputs/outputs (energy, commodities, wastes, wrapping and emissions). In those cases, the allocation was done on a weight basis (product production / annual production on site).
category: C:Manufacturing/17:Manufacture of paper and paper products/170:Manufacture of paper and paper products/1701:Manufacture of pulp, paper and paperboard

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from an important fine paper producer in the province of Quebec, Canada.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Fine papers have a wide range of size, finish and basis weight. To be representative of all the manufacturing possibilities, a weighted average of the papers recipes and used machines have been used.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Composition of wastewater rejected after treatment to river has been estimate from the European dataset  "paper production, woodfree, uncoated, at non-integrated mill, RER, 2000". Uncertainty has been adjusted consequently.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data collected from an LCA report of the paper producer made in 2011. This paper is produced on one site producing different grades of paper.

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
The reference flow is one air dry ton of product.

exchanges.description: Calculated value, acording to paper mass ratio at factory. Biogas (from sanitary landfill) burning provides most of the heat on site. A direct link to the dataset "heat and power co-generation, biogas, gas engine, Quebec" is made to ensure this fuel specificity. This dataset does not exactly reflect this specificity, as there is no co-generation but only heat production, but it is the most suitable is the current version of the database.
